name: Promodlive220
tagline: Call of Duty 4 - PromodLive 2.20's RAW files
body:
### Welcome to the only published source of promodlive versions
Promod is a competition mod for Call of Duty Modern Warfare, originally Maintaned by Ingram.

Maybe for the compile, you have to rewrite some stuff in makeMod.bat
```
cd ..\Mods\PromodLive218 <-- Rename this for your mod directory
copy ..\..\zone\english\mod.ff

pause
```

### Support or Contact
If you need any help, drop me an email to szabto at gmail [dot] com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
